name: Bee Together
description:
Play as BEE. Work together with BEAR. 

JOIN TOGETHER to make him STRONG.

FREE THE WOODLAND FROM SPIDERS!

THEME: You JOIN TOGETHER with the Bear to feed it honey. Stray to far from the Bear and you will BREAK your bond, canceling the feeding.

WHAT THE FLOWERS DO:

Blue = Speed

Red = Damage

Green = Attack Speed

ALL FLOWERS MAKE BEAR BIGGER! 

BUGS!

If the bear stops attacking and just walks into stuff, wait around a while, he has a failsafe but it doesn't always work. If this doesn't work, just let the enemies kill you, you can restart the level with no penalty.

The 'really quit' button doesn't work... Sorry.
